# Data visualization
Data visualization
```{r}
ggplot(data = arbuthnot, aes(x = year, y = girls)) + 
  geom_point()
```

Different graph
```{r}
ggplot(data = arbuthnot, aes(x = year, y = girls)) +
  geom_line()
```

Graphing help


# Adding a new variable to the data frame
```{r}
arbuthnot <- arbuthnot %>%
  mutate(total = boys + girls)
```

Glimpse the new column
```{r}
glimpse(arbuthnot$total)
```

Graphing the new total
```{r}
ggplot(data = arbuthnot, aes(x = year, y = total)) + 
  geom_line()
```

New ratio column
```{r}
arbuthnot <- arbuthnot %>%
  mutate(boy_to_girl_ratio = boys / girls)
```

Glimpse the new ratio column
```{r}
glimpse(arbuthnot$boy_to_girl_ratio)
```

New more boys than girls column
```{r}
arbuthnot <- arbuthnot %>%
  mutate(more_boys = boys > girls)
```

Glimpse the new more boys than girls column
```{r}
glimpse(arbuthnot$more_boys)
```

# More Practice
Summarize column: boys
```{r}
arbuthnot %>%
  summarize(min = min(boys),
            max = max(boys)
            )
```

Summarize column: girls
```{r}
arbuthnot %>%
  summarize(min = min(girls),
            max = max(girls)
            )
```
